title: ICT Integration Competency Development Course for Language Teacher Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience in using digital tools
context.additional_context: A process for in-service science teachers to learn ICT integration methods in language teacher education. Operated in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, emphasizing practical learning through simulations/VR

learning_goals: Learners can explain ≥3 approaches for designing ICT-integrated lessons within language education contexts
Learners can develop ICT-integrated lesson scenarios applying modeling and reflection-based instructional methods
Learners can identify ≥5 improvement points for ICT-integrated lessons through peer feedback and self-reflection

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
